mention.text: an act of revenge for the truth they have shown
The detention of LifeNews journalists in Ukraine
the Kiev authorities in an attempt
Alexei Pushkov , Head of the Duma Committee on Foreign Affairs
this original sin of the current regime in Kiev
the illegal seizure of power , its own illegitimacy
